QuestData.Title: A Triumphant Return
QuestData.Description:
This temple represents a new dawn for Bastion, $n.
The Temple of Devotion will stand as a place of fellowship. We will work with the Forsworn, as well as aspirants and kyrian of all experience and backgrounds, to forge a future of which all can be proud.
Let us return to Elysian Hold. I request that you join us for a momentous occasion--the ascension of a new Paragon and the creation of a new sigil.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Meet Kalisthene at Elysian Hold.
The Kyrian Courier can provide a flight.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Kyrian Courier to fly to Elysian Hold
